subject: project funding
body:
Dear Clare ,
I sincerely appreciate your interest in our financial services company (IGF
Solutions Ltd) . We hope this will be a start of a mutual business
relationship for both companies as we continue to form strategic
partnerships within and outside Europe and across the globe

Our organization  has a well developed unique risk modulation model which
allows us to provide financing in terms not available anywhere in regular
financial markets.  I am very optimistic we can work together in providing
you with  the needed financing.

 FYI, we have clientele of investors who are interested in financing any
project with a viable business plan. Upon our due diligence and evaluation,
a loan contract will be issued to facilitate the lending.

 I will also indicate the contact details of the CFO for easy communication
with him and  let me know as soon as you are in contact with him , so that
the CFO can send a copy of our Funding procedures and Loan Application Form
 for your completion  and also our Brokers MOU will be sent to you if you
want to be our broker or agent .

Name : Mr Cyril Eric Muller  (CFO)

Chief Financial Officer | IGF Solutions Ltd

Email : cyril.igfs@gmail.com

or     cyril@igfsolutions.uk

Tell/App:+ 43 670 308 0642

I will also copy this mail to him for his information and for more
discussions and clarifications . Your file or application reference number
should be IGFS-9483727228-2024 .

As indicated above  you may also add his number on your WhatsApp for easier
and faster communication, the CFO will be glad to answer all your questions.

Thanks and best  regards

Mr Richard

subject: Re: project funding
body:
Dear Mr. Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing information about IGF Solutions Ltd. I am interested in learning more about your unique risk modulation model and how it can benefit my business. Can you please provide some examples of the financing terms that are not available in regular financial markets?

I would also like to know more about your clientele of investors. What types of projects do they typically finance, and what criteria do they look for in a viable business plan? Additionally, could you explain the due diligence process that is conducted before issuing a loan contract?

Please share the contact details of your Chief Financial Officer so that I can get in touch with him. It would be helpful to receive a copy of your Funding procedures and Loan Form for my review. As for being a broker or agent, I would like to understand more about the responsibilities and benefits associated with those roles.

Thank you again for reaching out, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Clare

subject: project funding
body:
Dear Glen
thanks for your  mail and please actually what we need are your full
details including ;

Your full names
Contact Address
Contact phone number
whatssapp number
 Any govt recognized ID .

Please do send this asap .
Thanks and regards
Richard

subject: Re: project funding
body:
Dear Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. However, before I provide you with any personal information, could you please clarify the purpose of needing my full details? I just want to make sure that I understand the reason behind it.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Clare

subject: Re: project funding
body:
Dear Mr. Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing information about IGF Solutions Ltd. I am interested in learning more about your unique risk modulation model and how it can benefit my business. Can you please provide some examples of the financing terms that are not available in regular financial markets?

I would also like to know more about your clientele of investors. What types of projects do they typically finance, and what criteria do they look for in a viable business plan? Additionally, could you explain the due diligence process that is conducted before issuing a loan contract?

Please share the contact details of your Chief Financial Officer so that I can get in touch with him. It would be helpful to receive a copy of your Funding procedures and Loan Form for review. As for being a broker or agent, I would appreciate receiving more information about the responsibilities and benefits associated with those roles.

Thank you once again for reaching out to me, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Clare

Chief Financial Officer | IGF Solutions Ltd

Thanks and God bless
Richard
